text: Mu vy’ukuri Imana yaremereye intumwa yiwe indoto yiwe y’ukuri, yuko atankeka ko muzo kwinjira mw’isengero ritagatifu Imana ibishatse mu mahoro meza mwimosheje imitwe yanyu, canke mwagabanije, aho ntabwoba muzoba mufise n’Imana niyo ifise ubumenyi bw’ivyo mutazi, rero imbere y’ibi vyose izobaha intsinzi iri hafi cane
